chapter.title: Understanding the @@ProductName@@
chapter.para: This chapter describes how to log in to the system and use its main window.

section.title: Dashboard tab
section.para: There are four main areas in the Dashboard tab: Overall Health Check, Detected Issues, Account Information, Troubleshooting.

formalpara.title: Overall healthcheck
formalpara.para: This section shows the connection status.

listitem.para: Currently up, but has been down in the last 24 hours

formalpara.para: This section also shows the quality of service: good, bad, marginal, unknown.

formalpara.title: Account information
formalpara.para: The subscriber account information is displayed here.

formalpara.title: Detected issues
formalpara.para: An overview of the detected issues and the recommended troubleshooting steps are displayed here.

formalpara.title: Troubleshooting
formalpara.para: The troubleshooting workflows are displayed here.

section.title: Subscriber
section.para:
The @@ProductName@@ specific subscriber tab has the following information:
Subscriber account information
FTTx service information
FTTx service snapshot
Service quality history
Service quality information
Overview of detected issues and the recommended troubleshooting steps

section.title: Network Map
section.para: The Network Map shows the items through which the subscriber is connected to the network. The status of each item is noted by a green check mark (okay) or red X (faulty).

itemizedlist.para: The following are the components of the FTTx connection:

section.para: The FTTx interfaces with the results from NA-F to specify and indicate the location of the trouble.
The network map also indicates the optical link length and the distance between the OLT and ONT.

section.title: Diagnostics
section.para: The diagnostics tab lists some pre-defined tests that can be run to troubleshoot FTTx connectivity and service quality.

section.title: Workflows
section.para: In this section FTTx Connectivity & Quality Validation Workflow is listed.

formalpara.para: The workflow provides guided escalation to the customers and provides escalation path.
